title: Vicious Battleaxe
content:
Vicious Battleaxe Rare 3~12 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+2 Slashing Dolor Amarus: When you land a Critical Hit with this weapon, it deals an additional 7 damage.
